content: in this legal case a court in perugia has issued a final resolution after 7 years the court ordered one party ff to pay another party cg 42000 euros plus legal interest as part of the estate settlement the court also allocated a quarter of a postal deposit to cafp and another quarter to ca furthermore cg has been ordered to pay mrf 100 of the rental value of a former marital home the court cited the civil code and various facts and judgments leading up to this final resolution the text also mentions the rejection of a false complaint and the consolidation of multiple appeals the court addressed various arguments and grounds for appeal ultimately upholding the original judgment and making adjustments to the division of the estate and the allocation of costs the court has also made amendments to judgments rendered by the spoleto tribunal in a separate case declaring legal liability for another party car and nullifying a donation of 84000 euros the court has determined the total value of fps estate and ordered ff to pay cg a specific amount plus legal interest it has also allocated money and furnishings from the marital residence to both parties additionally cg is required to compensate car and fmr and is subject to a doubling of the unified contribution related to the appeal judgment the final decision was made on december 13 2022
